div.div:
• Partnership: Teams cooperate equally
• Customer/Supplier: Upstream/downstream
• Conformist: Downstream follows upstream
• ACL: Translate between models
• Shared Kernel: Shared subset of model
• Open Host: Published API
• Published Language: Standard protocol

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 193px; height: 1px; padding-top: 624px; margin-left: 8px;

div.div:
Each Bounded Context has its own:
• Ubiquitous Language
• Domain Model
• Data Storage
• Team ownership

switch.text: Each Bounded Context has its own:...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
